issue.message: Use a functional interface instead of lambda syntax for lambdas with primitive values in method pointerCounterGestureFilter has parameter 'onPointerCountChanged' with type Function1<? super Integer, Unit>.
Use a functional interface instead of lambda syntax for lambdas with primitive values in method setOnPointerCountChanged has parameter '<set-?>' with type Function1<? super Integer, Unit>.
Use a functional interface instead of lambda syntax for lambdas with primitive values in return type Function1<Integer, Unit> of 'getOnPointerCountChanged'.

Use a functional interface instead of lambda syntax for lambdas with primitive values in method RecyclingAndroidViewLazyColumn has parameter 'onChangeCheck' with type Function2<? super Integer, ? super Boolean, Unit>.
